parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Structured Text </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a [[Structured Text]] created from the given [[Structured Text|structured]] text and sets [[Structured_Text#Attributes | attributes]] to the given values.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Even though command accepts plain [[String]] too, the argument should be [[Structured Text]] in order for the set attributes to have an effect. Additionally the result of the command should be fed to [[composeText]] (See Example 1) or [[formatText]]</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> text '''setAttributes''' [name1, value1, name2, value2, ...] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> text: [[String]] or [[Structured Text]] - only passing [[Structured Text]] has any effect</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [name1, value1, name2, value2, ...]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of the attribute </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> value: [[String]] - value of the attribute </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_txt = [[text]] "Red text, right align";
_txt [[setAttributes]] ["color", "#ff0000", "align", "right"];
[[hint]] [[composeText]] [_txt];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[composeText]], [[formatText]], [[parseText]], [[text]], [[ctrlSetStructuredText]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
